Description: Neto, by Maropost, is the only B2B and multi-channel ecommerce platform that provides an all-in-one solution for ecommerce, POS, inventory management, order management, and shipping labelling.
Name: Neto

Methods.Name: Get Customer
Methods.Description: Retrieves the customer specified by Username or Email Address.

Methods.Name: List Updated Customers
Methods.Description: Retrieves customers updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Update Customer Log
Methods.Description: Updates an existing customer log. Customer logs are a record of communication made between you and a customer. (Multiple customer logs can be updated in one request)

Methods.Name: Create Customer Log
Methods.Description: Creates a new customer log. Customer logs are a record of communication made between you and a customer. (Multiple customer logs can be posted in one request)

Methods.Name: Update Customer
Methods.Description: Updates an existing customer. (Multiple customers can be updated in one request)

Methods.Name: List Customers
Methods.Description: Retrieves all customers.

Methods.Name: List New Customers
Methods.Description: Retrieves customers created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Create Customer
Methods.Description: Creates a new customer. (Multiple customers can be posted in one request)

Methods.Name: Add Payment
Methods.Description: Adds a new payment to an order/invoice. (Multiple payments can be posted in one request)

Methods.Name: Get Payment
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified payment.

Methods.Name: List New Payments
Methods.Description: Retrieves payments created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Payments
Methods.Description: Retrieves all payments.

Methods.Name: Create Product
Methods.Description: Creates a new product. (Multiple products can be posted in one request)

Methods.Name: List Updated Products
Methods.Description: Retrieves products updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Update Product
Methods.Description: Updates an existing product. (Multiple products can be updated in one request)

Methods.Name: List Products
Methods.Description: Retrieves all products.

Methods.Name: Get Product
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified product.

Methods.Name: Create Supplier
Methods.Description: Creates a new supplier. (Multiple suppliers can be posted in one request)

Methods.Name: Update Supplier
Methods.Description: Updates an existing supplier. (Multiple suppliers can be updated in one request)

Methods.Name: List Suppliers
Methods.Description: Retrieves all suppliers.

Methods.Name: List Pick Orders
Methods.Description: Retrieves orders with status 'Pick'.

Methods.Name: List All Orders
Methods.Description: Retrieves orders with any status.

Methods.Name: Create Order
Methods.Description: Creates a new order. (Multiple orders can be posted in one request)

Methods.Name: List Changed Orders
Methods.Description: Retrieves orders that have been changed since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Update Order
Methods.Description: Updates an existing order. (Multiple orders can be updated in one request)

Methods.Name: List New Orders
Methods.Description: Retrieves orders with status 'New'.

Methods.Name: List Pack Orders
Methods.Description: Retrieves orders with status 'Pack'.

Methods.Name: Get Currency Settings
Methods.Description: Retrieves the currency settings of your Neto account.

Methods.Name: Update Currency Settings
Methods.Description: Updates the currency settings of your Neto account.

Methods.Name: List Payment Methods
Methods.Description: Retrieves all payment methods.
